summary: Just a plain Leather Hood that is craftable, temperable and able to be worn with circlets.
descriptionHtml:
Ok this isnt anything fancy just a unenchanted thieves guild hood that is craftable in the forge and temperable. 

I made it quite strong because I like how it looks and I wanted it strong so it could last through out game. I also made it craftable with the elven armor perk so it could also be tempered to legendary quality. I also made it so you can use circlets with it.

Armor Rating: 20
Weight: 1
Value: 10

Materials
Forging: 2 Leather 1 Leather Strip
Tempering: 1 Leather

Armor in the picture is the Mercenary Triss armor from the Triss Armor Retextured found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708
author: Kellyevil
